name: .TASPROJ File Extension
summary: Learn about .TASPROJ files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a TASPROJ file in TAStudio, which is included with BizHawk. To do so:
Download and install BizHawk (using the link provided below).
Open TAStudio (by opening BizHawk and selecting Tools → TAStudio).
In TAStudio, select File → Open... and open your TASPROJ file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
